verses.verse: Then <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1129>"Build<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for me <S%H2088>here,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> for me <S%H2088>here.<s%>"

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> up a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on each <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Then <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H3320>"Stand<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and I will <S%H1980>go;<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7136>come<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> me, and <S%H4100>whatever<s%> <S%H1697><s%> He <S%H7200>shows<s%> me I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you." So he <S%H1980>went<s%> to a <S%H8205>bare<s%> <S%H8205>hill.<s%>

Now <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to Him, "I have <S%H6186>set<s%> up the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and I have <S%H5927>offered<s%> up a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on each <S%H4196>altar.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in Balaam's <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3541>thus.<s%>"

So he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to him, and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was <S%H5324>standing<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>discourse<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "From <S%H6307>Aram<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> has <S%H5148>brought<s%> me, Moab's <S%H4428>king<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of the <S%H6924>East,<s%> <S%H1980>'Come<s%> <S%H779>curse<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for me, And <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H2194>denounce<s%> <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>'

<S%H4100>"How<s%> shall I <S%H6895>curse,<s%> whom <S%H410>God<s%> has not <S%H6895>cursed<s%>? And <S%H4100>how<s%> can I <S%H2194>denounce,<s%> whom the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H2194>denounced<s%>?

"As I <S%H7200>see<s%> him from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H6697>rocks,<s%> And I <S%H7789>look<s%> at him from the <S%H1389>hills;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> [who] <S%H7931>dwells<s%> <S%H910>apart,<s%> And shall not be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

<S%H4310>"Who<s%> can <S%H4487>count<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> Or <S%H4557>number<s%> the <S%H7255>fourth<s%> <S%H7255>part<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright,<s%> And let my <S%H319>end<s%> be <S%H3644>like<s%> his!"

Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%> to me? I <S%H3947>took<s%> you to <S%H6895>curse<s%> my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you have <S%H1288>actually<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them!"
And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Must I not be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7760>puts<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>?"

Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H1980>come<s%> with me to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> from <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you may <S%H7200>see<s%> them, although you will <S%H657>only<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7097>extreme<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> of them, and will not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them; and <S%H6895>curse<s%> them for me from <S%H8033>there.<s%>"

So he <S%H3947>took<s%> him to the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6839>Zophim,<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on [each] <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H3320>"Stand<s%> <S%H3541>here<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> while I <S%H595>myself<s%> <S%H7136>meet<s%> [the] [Lord] <S%H3541>yonder.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H3541>thus<s%> you shall <S%H1696>speak.<s%>"

And he <S%H935>came<s%> to him, and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was <S%H5324>standing<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> with him. And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?"

Then he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>discourse<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> O <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to me, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor!<s%>

<S%H410>"God<s%> is not a <S%H376>man,<s%> that He should <S%H3576>lie,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> that He should <S%H5162>repent;<s%> Has He <S%H559>said,<s%> and will He not <S%H6213>do<s%> it? Or has He <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> and will He not <S%H6965>make<s%> it <S%H6965>good<s%>?
<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H3947>received<s%> [a command] to <S%H1288>bless;<s%> When He has <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> then I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H7725>revoke<s%> it.

"He has not <S%H5027>observed<s%> <S%H205>misfortune<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> has He <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5999>trouble<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> is with him, And the <S%H8643>shout<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is among them.
<S%H410>"God<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> them out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> He is for them like the <S%H8443>horns<s%> of the <S%H7214>wild<s%> <S%H7214>ox.<s%>

"For there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5173>omen<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> is there any <S%H7081>divination<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> At the proper <S%H6256>time<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> And to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> has <S%H6466>done.<s%>

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6965>rises<s%> like a <S%H3833>lioness,<s%> And as a <S%H738>lion<s%> it <S%H5375>lifts<s%> itself; It shall not <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> it <S%H398>devours<s%> the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> And <S%H8354>drinks<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>"
Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "Do not <S%H6895>curse<s%> them at <S%H6895>all<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> them at <S%H1288>all!<s%>"

But <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> "Did I not <S%H1696>tell<s%> you, <S%H3605>'Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>speaks,<s%> that I must <S%H6213>do<s%>'?"

Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> it will be <S%H3474>agreeable<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%> that you <S%H6895>curse<s%> them for me from <S%H8033>there.<s%>"
So <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%> which <S%H5921>overlooks<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H8259><s%> the <S%H3452>wasteland.<s%>

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1129>"Build<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for me <S%H2088>here<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> for me <S%H2088>here.<s%>"

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H559>said,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> up a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on [each] <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
